# prime_check_gmp

### Copyright (C) 2023 by Robert &lt;modrobert@gmail.com&gt;
### Software licensed under Zero Clause BSD.

---

### Description

C program which checks if given integer is a prime using the GNU MP library, it performs some trial divisions, a Baillie-PSW probable prime test, then reps-50 Miller-Rabin probabilistic primality tests.

---

### Usage

<pre>
prime_check_gmp v0.12 by modrobert in 2023
Syntax: ./prime_check_gmp &lt;integer or '0x' prefixed hex string&gt;
</pre>

---

### Install GMP library using Ubuntu Linux
<pre>
sudo apt-get install libgmp3-dev
</pre>

---

### Build

Use 'make' or compile manually with:
<pre>
gcc -O3 -Wpedantic prime_check_gmp.c -o prime_check_gmp -lgmp
</pre>

---

### Example output
<pre>
$ prime_check_gmp 4
not a prime

$ prime_check_gmp 11
definitely a prime

$ prime_check_gmp 
probably a prime

$ prime_check_gmp 0xa
not a prime

$ prime_check_gmp 0xd
definitely a prime

$ prime_check_gmp 
probably a prime
</pre>

---

### Performance for a 8192-bit prime
<pre>
$ time prime_check_gmp 
probably a prime

real	0m2.394s
user	0m2.393s
sys     0m0.000s
</pre>
